means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 冈特地方名称，来源于凯尔特语，含义是不详
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 冈特绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“瘦的，憔悴的”(thin,wasted,haggard)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 冈特职业名称，制作或销售手套者，来源于古法语，含义是“手套”(glove)

sentence.Network_en: Above on the hillside was a large, gaunt, grey house.
sentence.Network_cn: 山坡上有幢难看的灰色大房子。

sentence.Network_en: I cannot read what I have written with this gaunt hand.
sentence.Network_cn: 我无法读我这只瘦骨嶙峋的手写下的文字.

sentence.Network_en: Looking gaunt and tired, he denied there was anything to worry about.
sentence.Network_cn: 他看起来消瘦而疲惫，却说没什么可担心的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... squander（ 浪费，挥霍）； gaunt（ 消瘦的，憔悴的）； caustic（ 腐蚀的）；.
瘦字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 瘦小〖 slight〗 瘦削〖 scraggy;beverythin;gaunt〗 瘦子〖 alean(orthin)person〗.
英文单词有关虚弱_百度知道 ... floppy adj. 衰弱的；松软的 gaunt adj. 憔悴的，瘦削的 haggard adj. 憔悴的，消瘦的.
hotvocabulary ... gaudy a. 绚丽的 gaunt a. 憔悴的，瘦弱的；荒凉的 genen. 基因.

list.abs: his dry pallid face often looked gaunt ., 他那张干瘪苍白的脸常常显得憔悴.

even on his last day at the White House , when the thinning hair and gaunt face of a cancer patient was so evident , he stressed how he loved his job .即使在他在白宫的最后一天，在一个癌症病人的稀疏的头发和憔悴的脸如此明显的情况下，他仍表达了他是多么的热爱他的工作。
the gaunt face of a starving man ., 饿汉憔悴的面容.
he was a gaunt old man ., 他是一位瘦削的老人.
the gaunt man said gloomily , " It's always all right ; that's our trouble . " "瘦男人消沉地说：“每回都很顺利，这就是我们的麻烦。”

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: of unknown origin

entry.tran: （因生病、焦虑等）瘦削的，憔悴的
entry.def: If someone looks gaunt, they look very thin, usually because they have been very ill or worried.

example.ex: Looking gaunt and tired, he denied there was anything to worry about.
example.tran: 他看起来消瘦而疲惫，却说没什么可担心的。

entry.tran: （建筑物）寒碜的，非常不起眼的，难看的
entry.def: If you describe a building as gaunt, you mean it is very plain and unattractive.

example.ex: Above on the hillside was a large, gaunt, grey house.
example.tran: 山坡上有幢难看的灰色大房子。

means.word_mean: 1. very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold;

sentences.sentence: "a nightmare population of gaunt men and skeletal boys"
"kept life in his wasted frame only by grim concentration"

auth_sentence.content: He was an increasingly gaunt figure at the Square.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was an increasingly gaunt figure at the Square.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was an increasingly gaunt figure at the Square.

auth_sentence.content: West End life Mr Bean as Dickens's gaunt, beaky Fagin?

auth_sentence.res_content_con: West End life Mr Bean as Dickens's gaunt, beaky Fagin?

auth_sentence.content: He was a tall man and gaunt to the point of emaciation.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a tall man and gaunt to the point of emaciation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a tall man and gaunt to the point of emaciation.

means.word_mean: (因疾病、饥饿或焦虑等）瘦削的；憔悴的

sentences.en: The gaunt ruin of Pendragon Castle
sentences.cn: 破败不堪的古不列颠王侯潘特拉根城堡遗址
